nodes.text: A male Jenet was sent to spy on the Twi'lek mercenary Tavri and his boss, Nim Bola. The Jenet used an Imperial listening device to do so. The spy employed two Ossan toughs to monitor the premises while he did his work. Tavri found the Jenet and his guards and took the Ossans out with two stun blasts. When Tavri asked the Jenet to explain himself, the creature could not do so and Tavri shot him dead.
